name: DRYVER
description:
Your ship has been damaged and needs immediate repairs, but you are lightyears away from your destination. Nearby is the planet, Pulvis II, a barren wasteland with mere traces of civilization. You must venture deeper and deeper into the deserts of Pulvis II to scavenge the parts you need.

Note: WebGL sits on a black screen for 5-15 seconds while loading. Please just give it some time, it’s doing it’s best. 🙂

Changelog

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

1.0.1

  • Fixed issue with camera clipping
  • Fixed several typos
  • Fixed collecting parts resetting too early
  • Fixed UI not showing part icons and flavor text
  • Fixed pillar POI reset point
